### References Materials

This is a list of books that will be helpful to reference throughout the semester to build the R package.

[Happy Git and Github for the useR](Happy Git and GitHub for the useR) by Jenny Bryan

[R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz) by Hadley Wickham and Garrett Grolemund

[Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz) by Hadley Wickham

[R Packages](https://r-pkgs.org) by Hadley Wickham

[Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org) by Hadley Wickham
